Bask & Bloom Essentials Balancing Toner  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Bask & Bloom Essentials

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Rose Water, Green Tea Extract, Oatstraw Extract, Lavender Extract, Polysorbate, Essential Oil Blend and Optiphen.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental
ncer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
